value.name: Protesters rally over Kimani Gray shooting
value.description: Police say the 16-year-old gang member pulled a gun on cops, who shot and killed him. To the people rallying in Gray's name, it is all a lie. "I am a hundred percent certain that Kimani Gray did ...

value.name: NYC Cop Involved in Fatal Shooting of Black Teen Named Cop of the Year
value.description: The Muslim American Civil Liberties Coalition for Truth and Justice recently issued a statement calling for the NYPD Muslim Officers Society to rescind Cop of the Year honors to Sgt. Mourad.

value.name: Why Progressives Have Ignored Deaths Like Eric Garner’s For Years
value.description: This has been a terrible year for police brutality against African-Americans. Except it hasn’t. Because before Eric Garner and Michael Brown, there was Kimani Gray. And Kendrec McDade.
